title: Twilio Messaging API
description: Learn how to send and receive SMS, MMS, and WhatsApp messages from your Twilio account.

flavorTextOverrides.whatsapp: Looks like if I want to learn how to send messages with WhatsApp, I should explore that isthsmus to the right. Hah. Isthsmus. That's a funny word to say.
flavorTextOverrides.sms: So I should cross the bridge to learn more about the SMS APIs it seems?
flavorTextOverrides.boxes: Someone's Amazon order ended up in a funny place...
flavorTextOverrides.seaBreeze: You open your visor for a moment and taste the salt on the wind coming off the sea. It's hard to believe this is just a simulation...
